WRITING.TEXT: Take this article down before the wrong people see it! You never know who reddits
A teacher was explaining how to fill out an assignment sheet, as she explained how where to write your name she used the common term "So and so" and a kid ask, " Do we have to write so and so?"
Haha as ridiculous as that is, sadly that's how a lot of girls can be, They always come first basically
There's Real Dolls for that you know, and they can NEVER LEAVE YOU ha
Hey Adam Sandler is hot and so are biracial people so you can't bee too bad! lol That's weird, "hey look at my baby with my new boyfriend, let's get back together"

So I dated a guy who turned out to be a huge whiny bitch once I really got to know him. He was clingy and a real loser with no goals or ambitions, but I had liked him for a long time before we dated because he was funny. He also had abandonment issues from his meth addicted mom leaving him at a young age, so I was patient. Anyway I broke up with him after 3 months of misery and it got out of control quick.
He wanted to go on one last walk through the woods along the bayou and I was just trying to get it over with, he knew we were over though and was trying to change my mind. I absolutely hated him at this point and was stoned faced the whole time. I tell him we are done for good and he snatches my car keys and try's to throw them into the river. Btw I am 17 with no license at the time, and he's saying he's going to the local police station to tell them I'm driving W/O a license. I was trying to join the military at the time and didn't want anything on my record.
This is when things escalated. I lose my shit cause well, I hated him and I start shoving him trying to make him fall so I can snatch my keys but he fights back and at one point I bit him and grabbed him by the neck. He eventually stops screams and cries, throws my keys back to me and storms off, grabs a huge tree branch and BREAKS IT OVER HIS HEAD. The he goes up to a thorny tree and bangs his head repeatedly until he falls down.
I just leave and he starts screaming my name and catches up to be gets the keys back and and is all giddy and is seriously creeping me out. I realize I'll have to go about this in a different way and try to manipulate him into thinking I might still like him. This last for a good hour until I got him laying in my lap, his eye are closed and his hand with the keys are right there, so I quickly grab'em and dart for the trail out, get to my car and left him. I'm not proud of any of that. It was my first relationship and I had anger issues if my own
He still tried to get back together days later.

WRITING.TITLE: What is your craziest break up story?

WRITING.TEXT: The person taking the video sure knew what was about to happen
The pic on the left makes my heart hurt while the one on the right lifts me up 1000x cudos to you for having a heart and giving these babies a comfy home!
Some stories should remain inside of books
